

{{alias}}( str )
    Converts a number of milliseconds to a string duration.

    Parameters
    ----------
    str: string
        Input string.

    Returns
    -------
    out: string
        Duration string.

    Examples
    --------
    > var d = {{alias}}( 1030 )
    '1s30ms'
    > d = {{alias}}( 3600000 )
    '1h'
    > d = {{alias}}( 0 )
    '0ms'
    > d = {{alias}}( {{alias:@stdlib/constants/int64/pifirst}} )
    '1d'
    > d = {{alias}}( {{alias:@stdlib/constants/int64/pifirst}} + 3600000 + 60000 + 1000 + 100 )
    '1d1h1m1s100ms'

    See Also
    --------
